evidence.text: 1.  Order Denka to immediately take all necessary measures to eliminate the imminent and substantial endangerment posed by chloroprene emissions from the Facility;

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Order Denka to immediately take all necessary measures to eliminate the imminent and substantial endangerment posed by chloroprene emissions from the Facility

evidence.text: 2.  Order Denka to take all other actions as may be necessary to address and mitigate the harm to public health and welfare that Denka’s chloroprene emissions have caused;

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Order Denka to take all other actions as may be necessary to address and mitigate the harm to public health and welfare that Denka’s chloroprene emissions have caused

evidence.text: The United States seeks injunctive relief under Clean Air Act Section 303, 42 U.S.C. § 7603, requiring that Denka immediately reduce its chloroprene emissions to levels that no longer cause or contribute to unacceptably high cancer risks within the communities surrounding the Facility.

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: The United States seeks injunctive relief under Clean Air Act Section 303, 42 U.S.C. § 7603, requiring that Denka immediately reduce its chloroprene emissions to levels that no longer cause or contribute to unacceptably high cancer risks within the communities surrounding the Facility
